content:
Currently working for Tricentis as a Senior Software Engineer at R&D department.
Work Experience:
(Nov 2021 - Present) Senior Software Engineer at Tricentis - Vienna, Austria (Sep 2018 - Nov 2021) Software Engineer at Betsson Group - Ta’ Xbiex, Malta (Jun 2017 - Aug 2018) Software Engineer at Trendyol Group - Istanbul, Turkiye (Oct 2015 - Jun 2017) Software Engineer at Inveon - Istanbul, Turkiye (Aug 2014 - Oct 2014) Intern Software Engineer at Mews) - Prague, Czechia Education:\
(2011 - 2015) : Cukurova University - Computer Engineering - Adana, Turkiye Graduation project : Development of an Automatic Grading System and Plagiarism Detection Tool for Programming Assignments (2011 - 2012) : Cukurova University - School of Foreign Languages (English) - Adana, Turkiye (2008 - 2010) : Cukurova University - Computer Technology and Programming - Adana, Turkiye Languages:
Turkish: Native
English: C1
German: A2
